column4: Any idea how to insert driver into Ubuntu 10.04 during installation
Like what "driver" are you referring?
My Ubuntu 11.04 is not able to detect the Dell R620 machine due to PERC H310 card
First of all.. Why 11.04?
So I checked in LSI website and they have LSI MegaRAID SAS 9240c ard driver
Sorry 10.04
I want to install 10.04 on 12G..
Okay. Better. But, Ubuntu 10.04 supported the Perc h310 just fine.
No it doesnt support..I tried it a minute before
It dint show any disk during the partitioing
I checked in LSI website ..they have that..
But how to install it during the installation
Did u get me?
I speak English, not shrtspk.
? Did u get what my issue is?
I speak English, not shrtspk.
All I want to know is how to get the lsi driver installed during the installation
No idea if liveCD could help ..
Yeah. When you learn to spell simple words like "you", I may continue to help you.
Sorry if I am not good in english
It's not about being good or bad, it's that you KNOW better, and choose to be lazy. :p
